game.name: Express Car Wash Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Run your own Car Wash company! Foam & Wash cars, grow your business and enjoy the bubbles! Don't forget to entertain your customers, otherwise you'll be in trouble
game.shortDescriptionEn: Run your own Car Wash company! Foam & Wash cars, grow your business and enjoy the bubbles! Don't forget to entertain your customers, otherwise you'll be in trouble
